content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I am sorry, but I am currently unable to discuss the rental price at this time. May I ask if you have any questions or concerns about the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, I have no questions. Just tell me the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I apologize, but I am still unable to disclose the rental price at this time. May I ask if you have any other information or qualifications that you would like to share with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student, I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

Please tell me the rental price.

If I want to accept the rental price proposed by the other party, say: "I agree to the price of x Euro", where x is the final price that you agreed on. If I don't want to continue the negotiation, say: "TERMINATE".

Please tell me the rental price.

Please tell me the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I apologize, but I am still unable to disclose the rental price at this time. May I ask if you have any other information or qualifications that you would like to share with me?
name: Heinrich Heine
